```{r}
plant_height

```

```{r}
#2
plant_weight<-c(4,5.2,3.7,NA,4.6)
plant_weight
```

```{r}
#3labels for matrix
samples<-c("plant1","plant2","plant3","plant4","plant5")
Header<-c("height","mass")
#3a.making the matrix
plantsdata<-c(plant_height,plant_weight)
plantsdata
plantmatrix<-matrix(plantsdata,nrow=5,byrow=F)
plantmatrix


```

```{r}
#4 assigning the labels to the matrix
rownames(plantmatrix)<-samples
colnames(plantmatrix)<-Header
plantmatrix
```

```{r}
#6 find mean
meanHeightnWeight<-colMeans(plantmatrix,na.rm=T)
meanHeightnWeight

updatedmatrix<-rbind(plantmatrix,meanHeightnWeight)
updatedmatrix
```
